trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that supports horizontal scrolling of the tab headers in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个面板，支持中的选项卡标头的水平滚动<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The RibbonTabHeadersPanel provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: RibbonTabHeadersPanel 提供按行<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader>中一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>控件</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader>的水平滚动

trans-unit.source: Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持滚动向上或向下，和滚动按页。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Positions and sizes the child elements in this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 定位并调整其大小在此子元素<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The size that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel"></xref> needs to position its child elements.
trans-unit.target: 大小的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel"></xref>需要定位其子元素。

trans-unit.source: The actual size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 实际大小<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the horizontal axis is possible.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示能否在水平轴上滚动。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 不会实现。

trans-unit.target: 此 API 不会实现。

trans-unit.source: Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持滚动向上或向下，和滚动按页。

trans-unit.source: 0.0 in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下&0;.0。

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 获取滚动内容的水平大小[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A> value of the panel’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>的.面板的内部值</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>

trans-unit.target: 中的滚动内容的水平大小[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有任何默认值。

trans-unit.target: 获取滚动内容的水平偏移量[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.target: 此属性包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>的.面板的内部值</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content left by one line.
trans-unit.target: 滚动内容的一条向左。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content right by one line.
trans-unit.target: 将内容滚动权限的一条。

trans-unit.source: Forces content to scroll until the coordinate space of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> object is visible.
trans-unit.target: 强制内容滚动，直至的坐标空间<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>对象是可见的。

trans-unit.source: The object to make visible.
trans-unit.target: 要使可见的对象。

trans-unit.source: A bounding rectangle that identifies the coordinate space to make visible.
trans-unit.target: 标识要使其可见的坐标空间边框。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle that is visible.
trans-unit.target: 可见的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel>提供水平滚动的行中一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader>控件</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel>

trans-unit.source: Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持滚动向上或向下，和滚动按页。

trans-unit.source: 0.0 in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下&0;.0。

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 不会实现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel>提供水平滚动的行中一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader>控件</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel>

trans-unit.source: Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持滚动向上或向下，和滚动按页。

trans-unit.source: 0.0 in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下&0;.0。

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 获取的内容中的可见区域的水平大小[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A> value of the panel’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>的.面板的内部值</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 中的内容的可见区域的水平大小[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有任何默认值。
